author.name: Conchobar mac Dubhthach
author.description: An Irish bard of yore, who weaves dulcet melodies that capture hearts with tender love songs. With a quill dipped in courtly love, he pens metaphors of devotion, igniting the flames of passion in every soul who hears his verse.

newsMedieval:
With spices fair and summer's bloom,  
The wise chefs craft their dishes boon.  
A dash of dazzle, taste's delight,  
Their canvas bears the season's light.  

In '45, the year of dread,  
The choice before us: lives or dread.  
Should we unleash the demon's might,  
Or spare them from atomic night?  

An election fraught with despair,  
Democratic crisis in the air.  
Who shall lead us through the storm,  
With truth and justice as our norm?

feedItems.title: Cheat Sheet: How Smart Chefs Use Spices to Make Summer Recipes Even Better
feedItems.description: Add a dash of dazzle to peak produce and radically simple, no-oven recipes. With these key tips, you’ll streamline your spice rack and season like a pro.

feedItems.title: Could the U.S. Have Ended World War II With a 'Demonstration' Bomb?
feedItems.description: In 1945, American leaders debated whether to drop an atomic bomb in an unpopulated area to intimidate Japan into surrendering.

feedItems.title: Election in 2020 Fueled Crisis of Democracy. Voters Fear Repeat in 2024.
feedItems.description: Many Republicans believe that Trump beat Biden and that the next election will be stolen, while Democrats expect another GOP effort to overturn results.

author.name: Æthelred the Skald
author.description: A Norse poet who doth regale his audience with tales of gods and heroes, praising their might and prowess. He references Norse mythology and history in his poems. He is known for metaphors involving the sea and the weather and weaponry.

newsMedieval:
Hear of Sean O'Brien, bold and brash,
His tough deeds like a thunder's crash.
UPS bends 'neath his stern brow,
Yet Yellow resists, to no man they bow.

In Eastern lands, 'neath stormy skies,
Ukraine struggles, her spirit never dies.
Like a steadfast ship 'gainst gale's brutal whip,
Kyiv’s hopes wane, but never let slip.

Lo’, great dragon, once strong and tall,
The Chinese titan, now starts to fall.
Their mighty bond, like a ship in storm,
In market's tempest, doth lose its form.

feedItems.title: The Teamsters Boss Who Calls Himself S.O.B.
feedItems.description: Sean O’Brien’s tough tactics resulted in a deal with UPS and a defeat at Yellow.

feedItems.title: Ukraine Struggles to Retake Bakhmut From Dogged Russian Fighters
feedItems.description: Soldiers say advances have slowed in recent days against Russian defenses and counterattacks, denting hopes that Kyiv could soon retake the pivotal city.

feedItems.title: Another Big Chinese Property Domino Is Wobbling
feedItems.description: Bonds of Country Garden, China’s largest developer by contracted sales, have been in free fall.

author.name: Brother Arnulfus
author.description: A Benedictine monk who doth write devotional poems in Ænglish, praising God and the saints. His poems are often humorous, short, and satirical. They often contain metaphors of alcohol, especially wine or ale.

newsMedieval:
On this morn, a tale I tell in jest,
Of tank tops, toilet tales, and false chests.
Headhunters, oh the sights they spy,
In quest of truth, midst the applicant's lie!

Beneath the Lone Star, a decree is penned,
To the femine plight, an ear we lend.
Against the bans of birth, the judge did rail,
For women in travail, care shall not fail.

In distant Russia, 'gainst the autocrat's might,
Standeth Navalny, amidst the longest night.
"Nineteen winters more," the gavel sound, 
In prison walls, his future is found.

feedItems.title: Tank Tops, Toilet Trips and Lies: What Headhunters Can See
feedItems.description: Recruiters share their wildest stories from working with applicants seeking jobs and the companies considering hiring them.

feedItems.title: A Texas judge blocked the state from enforcing abortion bans against women facing serious pregnancy complications, saying essential care has been denied.
feedItems.description: A Texas judge blocked the state from enforcing abortion bans against women facing serious pregnancy complications, saying essential care has been denied.

feedItems.title: Russia's leading opposition figure, Alexei Navalny, was sentenced to a further 19 years in prison.
feedItems.description: Russia’s leading opposition figure, Alexei Navalny, was sentenced to a further 19 years in prison.

author.name: Guillemette de Ventadour
author.description: A whimsical troubadour from Occitania, who cherishes the company of nature's gentle creatures. She often includes metaphors of goats, dogs, rabbits, and snails in her poetry. Her writing style is terse.

newsMedieval:
In Tulsa, below the sky so pale,
Laws o'er Indians do not prevail.
Like rabbits clear of snare's release,
They move unhindered, blessed with peace.

At Russia's port came blow, so harsh,
Ukraine's stern drones through ether dash.
Like dogs in grain and oil fight,
The Black Sea roars, the heart of night.

The draught of joy 'gainst gloom does wage,
Treats mother's sorrow, turns the page.
Snails to spring, hope's bloom unfurls,
Blessing to dawns of worn, new girls.

feedItems.title: The Supreme Court let stand a lower court order exempting American Indians from a range of local laws in Tulsa, Okla.
feedItems.description: The Supreme Court let stand a lower court order exempting American Indians from a range of local laws in Tulsa, Okla.

feedItems.title: Ukraine struck one of Russia's largest ports with naval drones, disrupting shipments of grain and oil as fighting intensified in the Black Sea.
feedItems.description: Ukraine struck one of Russia’s largest ports with naval drones, disrupting shipments of grain and oil as fighting intensified in the Black Sea.

feedItems.title: The first pill to treat post-pregnancy depression will soon be available, after the Food and Drug Administration approved it.
feedItems.description: The first pill to treat post-pregnancy depression will soon be available, after the Food and Drug Administration approved it.
